Excited to see that the #EnsuringLastingSmilesAct has now been introduced in both the Senate and House.  This bill will correct a gap in insurance coverage for congenital anomalies and improve the lives of children who need our help https://twitter.com/NFED_ORG/status/1100591445910712320¬†‚Ä¶

Today I met with Kannon Koser to celebrate the introduction of the Ensuring Lasting Smiles Act. This bill would close a coverage gap for individuals born with congenital anomalies or birth defects. The bi-partisan bill will help children like Kannon get the care they need. #va05 pic.twitter.com/kkbWQB0XtG

Congressman Riggleman's Speech on the Ensuring Lasting Smiles Act. This bipartisan bill would ensure children born with congenital anomalies get the care they need.
